body.p: Synopsys Bridge offers multiple logging and diagnostic options. By default, logs are written to <current_working_directory>/.bridge directory. User can change this default location by passing the --home <directory_path> option.

section.title: Logging
section.p:
Synopsys Bridge offers the following JSON format logging options:
Pass --json-log to output JSON format logs to console.
Pass --json-log-file to enable JSON format logs in the bridge.log file in the Synopsys Bridge home directory.

section.title: Diagnostics
section.p:
To enable Synopsys Bridge diagnostics mode, pass a --diagnostics command line option. With this option set, Synopsys Bridge:
writes additional diagnostics information to bridge.log.
passes diagnostics related options to underlying tools so that they create logs under the Synopsys Bridge home directory.
writes execution state date to diagnostics.json file under the Synopsys Bridge home directory.
